name: Foxy Cube
description:
Foxy Cube is a puzzle game where you connect start and finish for each fox in the 3D level using different cube layouts and teleporter items. Use your spatial thinking to solve all the interconnected levels on the map.

  • Fun 3D puzzles
  • Requires 3D thinking
  • Interconnected levels and global item pool
  • Sci-fi design with cute fox
  • Several hours to play
  • Created as hobby project besides my studies

Foxy Cube is also available for free on Google Play.
